review_data.title: Daily Breakfast
review_data.content: We had a great breakfast here every morning. The food was very good and the selection was very broad.

review_data.title: 入口は狭いですが、中はゆったり
review_data.content: ヨーロッパで有りがちな入口が狭く段差があったりしますが、フロントエリアは広く取ってあり対応もスムーズ。スタッフも親切で好...More

review_data.title: Flexable - although a printed menu..... checked and brought what I wanted
review_data.content: Friendly and great service - sat down and drank, no pressure to order - I like that and WoW it had real live music of a very high standard

review_data.title: Excellent menu and tasty dishes
review_data.content: Seeing the busy Bahnhofstrasse while enjoying lunch. Fresh dishes, good service and acceptable prises.

review_data.title: Welcoming!!
review_data.content: Love the staff. Each one of them were friendly and accommodating. They went out of their way to get our room ready when we checked in about 9:00 am after traveling. They are all extremely helpful.

review_data.title: Excellent cuisine, breakfast, lunch and dinner
review_data.content: The restaurant is nice and light as it has a glass roof. Tables a bit small and close together. However service and food are first class.

review_data.title: Excellent Service
review_data.content: Went there to have a small family reunion. Food was very good, although on the pricey side, but the service was very warm, welcoming and excellent.

review_data.title: Excellent way to wind down for dinner
review_data.content: The comfortable chairs, the pianist, make this a pleasing way to wind down before dinner in one of the restaurants in the hotel

review_data.title: cozy lobby bistro
review_data.content: a little tight, but the lobby bistro was a nice place with the singer at night livening up the place with a rendering of jazz music. limited menu, but very edible, but a little expensive.

review_data.title: Russische Weihnachten
review_data.content: Als Gäste unserer Mutter durften wir das russische Buffet geniessen.Die Vorspeisen mit viel Lachs in allen Variationen und das warme...More
